Package net.pl3x.map.world

Class World

java.lang.Object
net.pl3x.map.Keyed
net.pl3x.map.world.World
public abstract class World extends Keyed
Represents a minecraft world.

      Parameters:
      name - world name
      Returns:
      a new key

    • init

      public void init()
      Initialize this world.

      This automatically happens when the world is registered.

      Calling this method on an initialized world with throw a IllegalStateException.

    • getName

      @NotNull public @NotNull String getName()
      Get the internal name of this world.

      On Bukkit servers this will be th world name, on other server types this will be the world's dimension identifier.

      Returns:
      world name
